name: Beegarde

aura.name: worker_bee
aura.description:
Sometimes drops Honey when assigned to Ranch.
While in team, Elizabee's stats will be increased.

description:
A servant that pledges loyalty to Elizabee.
Any that cause harm to the queen are immediately expelled from the hive.
It will gladly give its life to protect its queen.

skills.name: air_cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: wind_cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: bee_quiet
skills.description: Risks its life to cause a violent explosion, but receives the honor of falling in battle.

skills.name: poison_blast
skills.description: Hurls poison sludge at an enemy.

skills.name: acid_rain
skills.description: Creates acidic clouds that pour down acid rain on enemies.

skills.name: grass_tornado
skills.description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: solar_blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
